full_summary:
# Digital Asset Management (DAM) Solution

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** MX-42944423871
* **Solicitation Number:** CMHR 1022436
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-15T15:00:00 (Expired)

## Description of the Opportunity

The Canadian Museum for Human Rights (CMHR) is seeking a Digital Asset Management (DAM) vendor to provide a solution that meets the Museum's needs. The ideal solution should feature:

* An easily accessible, self-service central repository for all digital assets
* Search capabilities that reduce manual processes and support automated retention of institutional memory and operational functions
* Tools that support productivity and efficiency gains
* Support activities focused on goals, not processes
* A central source of assets for all Museum uses, including providing assets to the public, integrated into overall Museum strategy and operational plans

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD), Services Rendered (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** None
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Documents

Bidding and documents are available on Merx.com (https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2688985115/abstract). Fees may apply; see Merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

## Contact Information

* **Procurement Specialist:** Bids@humanrights.ca
* **Phone:** 204-583-2751
